title: HEELE Dog Muzzle Breathable Mesh and Durable Nylon Dog Muzzle with Adjustable Loop and Soft Pad Dog Training Muzzle Prevent for Barking, Biting and Chewing (Black, M)
features: COMFORTABLE & BREATHABLE: Practical and reliable dog muzzle is made with high-quality black nylon material, designed to be well-fitting and long-lasting. The interior of the muzzle has extra soft padding providing the ultimate comfort for your pet. Minimize restraint and injury to dogs.

SOFT & LIGHTWEIGHT MUZZLE FOR DOGS: Mesh design gives all-around mouth protection allowing canines unrestricted eating, drinking and panting while preventing biting. Soft muzzle for dogs used for safe socialization, safe handling during vet visits, grooming or dog travelling.
ADJUSTABLE & BREATHABLE: Adjustable at snout and neck strap. Keep the muzzle tight enough to control his bite, but loose enough to allow freedom to pant and yawn
SAFE & SECURE: Ergonomically designed safety strapping ensures muzzle will remain securely in place, and features easy to fit and secure Lock-on Buckle

EASY TO WEAR & CLEAN: 1, Open the velcro, put this muzzle on your dog’s mouth and then find the most comfortable angle for your dog. 2, Stick the velcro and adjust the straps over your dog head. 3, Buckle closure. It is recommended to buy 2 muzzles for your dog to replace, do not wear wet o dirty muzzle again!
description: Product Description What times need a muzzle? When you walking your dogs, the dogs are happy to play and find something. Trash and moldy food are often hidden in the grass. For protect their health, we don't want they to eat things of unknown origin and insecurity by mistake. The dogs always are interested in othes dogs, but sometimes the way they play each other is special, may bite each other if they feel invaded. Put on a muzzle to prevent biting, hurting themselves or others. In public places and public transport, especially when going to the vet, wearing a HEELE dog muzzle can prevent barking and bother others. How to Put on The Muzzle: Step 1 Open the dog muzzle and measure the size of your dog's mouth and adjuste to the right size. Tips: before the dog wears it for the first time, please let the dog smell the muzzle and be familiar with it, this action can be well prevent dogs from resisting unfamiliar touches. Step 2 Carefully and gently cover the dog's mouth with the muzzle, take care not to block his eyes. Tips: If the dog feels uncomfortable or has a reaction, please pause this action at first, then try to give him some snacks to encourage and repeat it until he can accepts the muzzle. Step 3 Put the mesh part up and adjust to the center the mouth. Tear off the smooth side of the Velcro, put the other side on, last put the smooth side on, finished. Ensure the dog comfortable, can breathe freely and drink water with its tongue out. Step 4 Adjust the length of the strap to fit the dog's neck and fasten the buckle. Make sure that the muzzle is firmly and will not fall off.
